message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: // Create a list of entries from the map
List<Map.Entry<String, Integer>> entries = new ArrayList<>(map.entrySet());

// Sort the list in descending order based on the scores
Collections.sort(entries, new Comparator<Map.Entry<String, Integer>>() {
    public int compare(Map.Entry<String, Integer> a, Map.Entry<String, Integer> b) {
        return b.getValue().compareTo(a.getValue());
    }
});

// Get the top half of the list
List<Map.Entry<String, Integer>> topScores = entries.subList(0, entries.size() / 2);

// Create a new map with the top scores
Map<String, Integer> topScoresMap = new HashMap<>();
for (Map.Entry<String, Integer> entry : topScores) {
    topScoresMap.put(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
}

// Update the original map with the top scores
map = topScoresMap;
<<<explanation>>>: First, we create a list of entries from the map. Then, we sort the list in descending order based on the scores using a custom comparator. Next, we get the top half of the list using the subList method. We create a new map with the top scores and update the original map with the top scores.
